scripts.build:web: emcmake cmake -B wbuild -G Ninja && cmake --build wbuild
scripts.watch:web: npx -y nodemon -w example -e 'c h png' --exec 'npm run build:web'
scripts.build:raylib: cmake -B build -G Ninja -D EXAMPLES=RAYLIB && cmake --build build
scripts.build:sdl2: cmake -B build -G Ninja -D EXAMPLES=SDL2 && cmake --build build
scripts.build:retro: cmake -B build -G Ninja -D EXAMPLES=RETRO && cmake --build build
